description: This file defines a utility function 'isAuthDisabled' that checks an environment variable to determine if authentication is disabled, typically for testing purposes. It exports this function for use in other parts of the project.

methods.name: isAuthDisabled()
methods.description: Returns true if the environment variable 'REACT_APP_DISABLE_AUTH' is set to a truthy value, indicating that authentication is disabled and protected routes do not require authentication.
